questions.question: What is meant by the term web3?

options.answer: The third generation of the Internet, characterized by decentralized systems and native digital assets
The third iteration of the Internet, characterized by the rise of social media and user-generated content

questions.question: Who can help you if you lose your private key or seed phrase?
Who can prevent you from creating an Ethereum account?
Which is the best analogy for a public address?

options.answer: An account number for your account
A savings account at a bank

questions.question: Which is the best analogy for a private key?

options.answer: Ten thousand spoons when all you need is a knife
A phone number for your account
